creator: Dennis Nicolas Perzl
descriptionHtml:
A Void Society is a post-apocalyptic text adventure written in the style of a messenger app. In A Void Society you will experience a gripping end times story, in real time. You chat to different characters, give them advice and make decisions for them, thus determining how the story unfolds!

We redeveloped the app from scratch to get it into shape for 2020. It’s better looking, more stable, and simply superior. Now it really is a platform deserving of a constantly evolving story. We want to thank all our fans for over 40,000 great ratings and almost 1 million downloads. You made it all possible.

THE BACKSTORY

Nothing is as it was. A devastating pandemic turned the world completely upside down and since then it has been ruled by marauding hordes of zombies. Only David Blythe, allegedly the last survivor of this killer virus, has been hiding away in his apartment, helpless and lonely. He puts his last hope for help in a computer program to try and find other survivors.

Right now, it seems as though real life has eerily caught up with David’s story. But despite everything that’s going on at the moment, we must always remember that this is just a game!

SAVE DAVE!

His supplies are dwindling away to nothing, the solitude is bringing him down and the living dead are getting ever closer. He sends out one last desperate cry for help and all of a sudden, there you are at the other end of the line. From now on, as his constant companion, you accompany him on his adventures from the comfort of your own phone, guiding and supporting him in this action-packed fight for his life against the zombies. In real time, you help David develop elaborate survival strategies to escape the dangers of the apocalypse lurking around every corner and to find other survivors. You even put up with David’s whining whenever he’s close to losing his nerve.

THINK CAREFULLY BEFORE YOU CHOOSE!

Together, you will have to overcome some dicey situations while searching for vital resources like food and mobile phone chargers. But be careful! One false turn could spell the end for our amiable nerd. Every decision you make in this survival text adventure will directly affect David’s chances of survival and shape how the story unfolds.

SOLVE THE PUZZLE!

The deeper you delve into the conundrum surrounding the pandemic, the more mysterious messages you seem to randomly get. These echoes are more than just a reflection of past events. It appears that the origin of the virus isn’t the only riddle in this universe, not even by a long shot. How is it possible for you to communicate with someone through time and space using a simple messenger app? What is the Parallax? And what has this AI called Cathy got to do with all of it?

MEET THE GAMERS!

In our second series, a group of gamers is investigating the same mystery. After a three-day LAN party they realize with horror that the world as they knew it has gone forever. Aside from their concern about what happened to their families and how long their supplies might last, only one important question remains: Will the game finally drop the piece of equipment they’ve been hankering after for their character?

A VOID SOCIETY
● Two gripping series
● 18 episodes and counting
● New episodes released regularly
● Several paths through every episode
● A well-thought-out fictional universe
● The perfect storytelling mode for mobile devices

Go to the developer’s blog for hints & news about the app:
https://avoidsociety.app/connect/blog

Please email the help bot with any questions, queries or feedback you may have:
parallax@cloudtells.de

We redeveloped the app from scratch to get it into shape for 2020. It’s better looking, more stable, and simply superior. Now it really is a platform deserving of a constantly evolving story. We want to thank all our fans for over 40,000 great ratings and almost 1 million downloads. You made it all possible.

THE BACKSTORY

Nothing is as it was. A devastating pandemic turned the world completely upside down and since then it has been ruled by marauding hordes of zombies. Only David Blythe, allegedly the last survivor of this killer virus, has been hiding away in his apartment, helpless and lonely. He puts his last hope for help in a computer program to try and find other survivors.

Right now, it seems as though real life has eerily caught up with David’s story. But despite everything that’s going on at the moment, we must always remember that this is just a game!

SAVE DAVE!

His supplies are dwindling away to nothing, the solitude is bringing him down and the living dead are getting ever closer. He sends out one last desperate cry for help and all of a sudden, there you are at the other end of the line. From now on, as his constant companion, you accompany him on his adventures from the comfort of your own phone, guiding and supporting him in this action-packed fight for his life against the zombies. In real time, you help David develop elaborate survival strategies to escape the dangers of the apocalypse lurking around every corner and to find other survivors. You even put up with David’s whining whenever he’s close to losing his nerve.

THINK CAREFULLY BEFORE YOU CHOOSE!

Together, you will have to overcome some dicey situations while searching for vital resources like food and mobile phone chargers. But be careful! One false turn could spell the end for our amiable nerd. Every decision you make in this survival text adventure will directly affect David’s chances of survival and shape how the story unfolds.

SOLVE THE PUZZLE!

The deeper you delve into the conundrum surrounding the pandemic, the more mysterious messages you seem to randomly get. These echoes are more than just a reflection of past events. It appears that the origin of the virus isn’t the only riddle in this universe, not even by a long shot. How is it possible for you to communicate with someone through time and space using a simple messenger app? What is the Parallax? And what has this AI called Cathy got to do with all of it?

MEET THE GAMERS!

In our second series, a group of gamers is investigating the same mystery. After a three-day LAN party they realize with horror that the world as they knew it has gone forever. Aside from their concern about what happened to their families and how long their supplies might last, only one important question remains: Will the game finally drop the piece of equipment they’ve been hankering after for their character?

A VOID SOCIETY
● Two gripping series
● 18 episodes and counting
● New episodes released regularly
● Several paths through every episode
● A well-thought-out fictional universe
● The perfect storytelling mode for mobile devices

Go to the developer’s blog for hints & news about the app:
https://avoidsociety.app/connect/blog

Please email the help bot with any questions, queries or feedback you may have:
parallax@cloudtells.de

title: A Void Society

creator: Extraordinerdy
descriptionHtml:
THE new series phenomenon for mobile where YOU are part of the story!
Fans of Mystery and Thriller Games, take note: This is a story that will grab you and never let you go! Set out on an enthralling adventure and piece together how the apocalypse unfolded!

You receive a message from the last survivor of the apocalypse. 🧟 At least, David thinks he’s the last survivor. But then, finally, his desperate calls for help are answered: by you! His fate rests in your hands now!

😱 Realistic & Exhilarating - Chat with “real” people in the Messenger.
🤔 Make Decisions - In Story Games, you decide how the adventure unfolds!
🤫 Be careful! - Who can you really trust?

Like interactive games? How about a whole series?
Brand new episodes are released every month. Take on the lead role in this interactive Mystery Thriller!

🎁 Free: You choose whether you want to help fund the project!
⭐️ Ad-free: Enjoy the entire Thriller without interruptions from the first episode to the last.
🇬🇧🇺🇸 English: Play through the entire original story in English!
🎮 No annoying Minigames: With us, it’s all about the excitement of the story!
😽 Outstanding Support: We’re always here for you!

STORY
The mysterious SH311 has turned the world into a hostile place. Bloodthirsty zombies roam the streets. 🧟 Civilization as we know is close to collapse. After seven months of isolation, David has nearly used up his supply of instant ramen and pudding cups. Soon it will be time to leave the safety of the apartment and embark on an exciting adventure! His one remaining hope is the rumors of a colony of survivors. What does the stranger on the street know about it? And can they even be trusted?

🤓 📖 Interactive Story - This Text Adventure uses your imagination to tell its captivating and gripping story: like an interactive book.
😲 🎬 Cinematic Storytelling - Authentic characters, a rich story universe and tense cliffhangers make this Chat Game one of the best of its kind, according to many of its fans.
🤩 📺 Series with over 7 Episodes - Brand new episodes are released every month. 7 Episodes with more than 15 days of game time have already been released. Plus, bonus content is released every week.

Download now! - Let the Chat Games commence!

🏆 From the team that brought you the indie hit “The Parallax”: We’ve spruced up our Text Adventure for 2021. And our interactive series now has a new name. Discover the original today, with expansions that continue to push the boundaries of the Chat Game genre! A VOID SOCIETY remains a truly Indie Game!

Join in the fun now! - Discover what it is that has captured the hearts thousands of loyal fans!

🤫 Spoiler Alert: What happens in Season 3?
In Season 3 (starting April 2021), the Group have to finally solve the puzzle of their missing friend. Without knowing it, they have stumbled onto the trail of an unsolved crime. Can you help them play detective? Time is running out! With every decision made, this Crime Thriller comes closer to one of several different endings.

Like Chat Games? 👉 Then A VOID SOCIETY is the perfect Mystery & Sci Fi adventure for you.

🧳 Even more content:
Our App has not one but two Interactive Story series: The latest episode of the Spin-Off series, Episode 7, sees our lovable 👾 gamer clique continue their adventure. They may love gruesome games but they certainly never counted on experiencing such an authentic Horror Chat Game in real life. To be continued.

Got questions about the game or want us to publish your Fan Fiction? Write to us at support@avoidsociety.app! (We’ll also help you transfer your progress from The Parallax)

His one remaining hope is the rumors of a colony of survivors. What does the stranger on the street know about it? And can they even be trusted?

🤓 📖 Interactive Story Games - This Text Adventure uses your imagination to tell its captivating and gripping story: like an interactive book.
😲 🎬 Cinematic Storytelling - Authentic characters, a rich story universe and tense cliffhangers make this Chat Game one of the best of its kind, according to many of its fans.
🤩 📺 Series with over 7 Episodes - Brand new episodes are released every month. 7 Episodes with more than 15 days of game time have already been released. Plus, bonus content is released every week.

Download now! - Let the Chat Games commence!

🏆 From the team that brought you the indie hit “The Parallax”: We’ve spruced up our Text Adventure for 2021. And our interactive series now has a new name. Discover the original today, with expansions that continue to push the boundaries of the Chat Game genre! A VOID SOCIETY remains a truly Indie Game!

Join in the fun now! - Discover what it is that has captured the hearts thousands of loyal fans!

🤫 Spoiler Alert: What happens in Season 3?
In Season 3 (starting April 2021), the Group have to finally solve the puzzle of their missing friend. Without knowing it, they have stumbled onto the trail of an unsolved crime. Can you help them play detective? Time is running out! With every decision made, this Crime Thriller comes closer to one of several different endings.

Like Chat Games? 👉 Then A VOID SOCIETY is the perfect Mystery & Sci Fi adventure for you.

🧳 Even more content:
Our App has not one but two Interactive Chat Story series: The latest episode of the Spin-Off series, Episode 7, sees our lovable 👾 gamer clique continue their adventure. They may love gruesome games but they certainly never counted on experiencing such an authentic Horror Chat Game in real life. To be continued.

Got questions about the game or want us to publish your Fan Fiction? Write to us at support@avoidsociety.app! (We’ll also help you transfer your progress from The Parallax)
